title: 48: The Top Amazon Finds Episode
itunes:title: The Top Amazon Finds Episode
description: The Amazon isn’t just a rainforest in South America, it’s also THE BEST shopping site for great products that are hard to find in stores. In today’s episode, Lisa shares her favorite AMAZON FOOD FINDS!! From healthy rice alternatives and secret all-natural cheese powder to TASTY low-sugar sweets, this episode has it all! Plus, a new protein bar that’s a total GAME CHANGER!! If you’ve never been on Amazon.com or you’re already hooked, get ready — you’ll be one-clicking up a storm! [www.hungry-girl.com/foodcast](http://hungry-girl.com/foodcast)
